categories: Category:Classic Star Wars: A Long Time Ago...

nodes.text: Classic Star Wars: A Long Time Ago... 2
Classic Star Wars: A Long Time Ago... #2 is the second volume in the Dark Horse Comics black-and-white collections of the original Marvel Comics series of comic books.
This black-and-white reprint collects Marvel Star Wars issues #28 - "Cavern of the Crawling Death," #38 - "Riders in the Void," #49 - "The Last Jedi," and #50 - "The Crimson Forever."
